formatted_address: 83 Punggol Central, B1-25 Waterway Point East Wing, Singapore 828761
name: Scarlett Supermarket (Waterway Point)

reviews.text: Chinese supermarket selling titbits and snacks from Mainland China. Most of them are hardly seen elsewhere locally. Pricing are pretty decent and not expensive. This branch at Waterway Point occupies a smaller shop space than the others (eg Chinatown). But it have its own shares of unique items. Worth the time to slowly walk around and check out the items in the shop.

Scarlett Supermarket sells mainly china produced food products. Therefore you will find some unique and interesting types of food products here. Not the typical supermarket stuff you find locally. They also have fresh produce like vegetables and fruits. I like their super big bottle of popcorn.

Scarlett Supermarket is a China supermarket offering customers value-for-money products with a variety stock from groceries to all-time-favorite snacks. The wide range of products including confectionery, noodles, beverages, alcohol, frozen food, sauces, seasoning and daily essentials to ensure that the needs of both locals and Chinese are met.

Scarlett Supermarket now has a chain of 15 outlets spanning across the island state. There are four 24-Hour Supermarkets located at People's Park Complex, Terengganu Street, Westgate and Bedok.
Visited on 24 Dec 2023, I think they have many items on offer in the store. 2 bottles of honey pear drinks are $1, 2 bottles of ice lemon tea are $1, and 3 bottles of qi drinks are $2.
Bad service, I bring my own bag the cashier scan the items and never put into the bag. This is my last time visiting this supermarket.

vicinity: 83 Punggol Central, B1-25 Waterway Point East Wing
